price: 27. Oo ka yeelin dhulka dhexdiisa buuro sugan oo dhaadheer oo aan idinka waraabinin biyo macaan?
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِيَ شَٰمِخَٰتٖ وَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰكُم مَّآءٗ فُرَاتٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā fīhā rawāsiya shāmikhātin wa-asqaynākum māan furātan
translations: and We gave you to drink
